alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:13PM MDT until May 27 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Todd County in south central South Dakota... Southern Tripp County in south central South Dakota... Southeastern Mellette County in south central South Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Ring Thunder to 4 miles east of Littleburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Haystack Butte around 630 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Keyapaha, Okreek, Wood, Clearfield, Butte Creek, Millboro, Mosher and Dog Ear Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
